short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for managing and switching between PAC (Proxy Auto-Configuration) scripts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PACify is a powerful Chrome extension designed for developers, IT administrators, and anyone who frequently uses PAC (Proxy Auto-Configuration) scripts. With PACify, you can easily manage, edit, and switch between PAC scripts with a user-friendly interface.

Key Features:
  - Create and edit PAC scripts with live validation and syntax highlighting.
  - Switch between PAC scripts instantly with “Quick Switch” mode.
  - Import/export scripts and settings for easy backups.
  - Customizable settings, including script colors and activation toggles.

Whether you need to test network configurations or set up proxies for your organization, PACify simplifies the process.
